# Blur (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 251

The subject’s outline appears blurred, shifting, and wavering. This distortion grants the subject concealment (20% miss chance). A *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* spell does not counteract the *blur* effect, but a *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]* spell does.

Opponents that cannot see the subject ignore the spell’s effect (though fighting an unseen opponent carries penalties of its own).
